long_description: Give your budding explorer serious-and fun-eye protection from harmful UV rays with RKS Explorer Sunglasses for toddlers. Lenses are impact-resistant, shatterproof polycarbonate that provide 100% UVA/UVB protection. Colorful wrap-around frame minimizes exposure to peripheral light. Flexible frame has a soft, adjustable strap that holds the sunglasses on comfortably; can be removed when your child grows older. RKS Explorer Sunglasses for toddlers, like all Real Kids Shades, are tested to contain no lead, BPA or phthalates. Designed for toddlers age 2+.
short_description: Give your budding explorer serious-and fun-eye protection from harmful UV rays with RKS Explorer Sunglasses for toddlers.
